Package domain

Class ChessGame

java.lang.Object
domain.ChessGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Entity public class ChessGame extends Object implements Serializable
Class responsible for building an entity of a game of chess with two players and a list of moves
Author:
Joaquim Simoes, nº54599, Diogo Mateus, nº53374
